hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
### use this if you want to stop dead on its tracks #exit 1
#cd /html/eol_php_code/applications/content_server/resources #rm -f wikipedia_generation_status*.txt #[ -f wikipedia_*.tmp ] && rm -f wikipedia_*.tmp || echo "Files do not exist"
cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors php wikipedia.php jenkins en #English #should generate 80.tar.gz
#--------------------- #initially six (6) connectors #echo "start Wikipedia en build..." #php wikipedia.php jenkins en generate_resource 1 416666 1of6 #php wikipedia.php jenkins en generate_resource 416666 833332 2of6 #php wikipedia.php jenkins en generate_resource 833332 1249998 3of6 #php wikipedia.php jenkins en generate_resource 1249998 1666664 4of6 #php wikipedia.php jenkins en generate_resource 1666664 2083330 5of6 #php wikipedia.php jenkins en generate_resource 2083330 2500000 6of6 #all remaining
